backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregated short summaries for all frontend source files and assets.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_FAILURE_REPORT.md: Template for recording deployment failure details and error output.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_OUTPUT.md: Template document for tracking latest deployment status and metadata.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RETRY.md: Runbook describing how to retry deployment without code changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme and component styling including nav links, sections, and cards.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point with SEO tags, favicons, and root mounting element.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all crawlers and provides sitemap location.
frontend/public/site.webmanifest: Web manifest defining app name, icons, colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap declaring the site's root URL and metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders full site layout with header, sections, footer, SEO, and error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that shows a fallback screen on runtime errors.
frontend/src/components/ContactForm.tsx: Contact form component with validation, success state, and styled inputs.
frontend/src/components/MobileNav.tsx: Renders a mobile navigation menu with links, highlighting the active section and handling smooth navigation.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Shows the About section with title, content paragraphs, statistics, and optional partners list.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders the Contact section including contact details and a contact form with email validation.
frontend/src/components/sections/HomeSec: Implements the hero section with background visuals, company tagline, main heading, and CTA buttons that scroll to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Displays a grid of service cards with icons, titles, and descriptions sourced from site content.
frontend/src/components/SeoStructuredDat: Injects JSON-LD organization metadata into the page for SEO using site content and generated URLs.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays company info, quick links, and contact details with smooth-scroll navigation and email validation.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Provides a responsive header with logo, desktop and mobile navigation, and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides static text and structured content for company info, home, about, services, and contact sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks which page section is currently visible using IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidates queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login, stored identities, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend React Query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useRuntimeSeo.ts: Dynamically updates canonical and social meta tags based on the current site URL.
frontend/src/index.css: Re-exports the root index.css for styling.
frontend/src/lib/isValidEmail.ts: Contains a simple email validation utility using a basic regex.
frontend/src/lib/siteOrigin.ts: Provides helpers to get the current site origin and construct full URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, plugins, colors, spacing, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and pending feature requests for layout and navigation updates.
